Games

Mostly card games, inspired by stock trading, betting, poker and truco.

  • (05 Oct 2025) Botella showdown

    Showdown card game played with 2 or 3 players. Simple and straight-forward, tactical rumy style.

  • (30 Sep 2025) The Sum guessing

    A guessing game where players must guess the total sum of all cards in play, seeing only some of them. They bet with each other on their guess. This game is simple, but can be a bit brainy.

  • (19 Sep 2025) Tricky Poker betting

    A game played by tricks with no trump suit, inspired by the famous game Poker and the Latin American game Truco.

  • (14 Sep 2025) Royal Assassin p2p battle

    The crown is yours, and there's peace within the kingdom at last. But beyond your lands, a rival threatens your reign. Its king seeks to crush you before your power grows. This time, you're not alone, the lords that were once your enemies will stand by you in battle. With the four fiefdoms' armies and the Jokerâ€™s hand guiding the unseen war, you prepare to strike first.

  • (12 Sep 2025) Stonks! trading

    This is a betting game inspired by stock market trading. Players bet with each other on the expected next card suit and number.

  • (04 Sep 2025) Truco variantes

    Lista de variantes y reglas alternativas al truco que jugamos en Argentina y Uruguay.

  • (02 Sep 2025) Dilemma psychology

    A kind of trick-taking game, where the objective is to win the most points, inspired by the prisonerâ€™s dilemma.

  • (12 Feb 2025) Free Market options

    A tactical game of speculation and volatility. Accumulate wealth by buying and selling option contracts based on the price movement of an underlying asset. Avoid bankruptcy and reach the Net Worth target to win.
